表格客户表的代码预览

drop index 服务顾问_FK on client;

drop index hykf_FK on client;

drop index client_PK on client;

drop table if exists client;

/*==============================================================*/
/* Table: client */
/*==============================================================*/
create table client
(
clientno varchar(50) not null,
mid int,
artisanid varchar(50),
clientname varchar(50),
cphone varchar(20),
caddress varchar(100),
cbrind date,
khsf varchar(20),
city varchar(20),
county varchar(20),
khbz varchar(100),
primary key (clientno)
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: client_PK */
/*==============================================================*/
create unique index client_PK on client
(
clientno
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: hykf_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index hykf_FK on client
(
mid
);

/*==============================================================*/
/* Index: 服务顾问_FK */
/*==============================================================*/
create index 服务顾问_FK on client
(
artisanid
);

alter table client add constraint FK_hykf foreign key (mid)
references member (mid) on delete restrict on update restrict;

alter table client add constraint FK_服务顾问 foreign key (artisanid)
references artisan (artisanid) on delete restrict on update restrict;
